summary: Why Giving Up On Comic Books Is OK
title: Why Giving Up On Comic Books Is OK
body:
Why Giving Up On Comic Books Is OK - Check out my blog post discussing the guilt of giving up on comic books

I got into comic books pretty late in the game (see my post about that here). The thrill of collecting issues soon waned though as I grew overwhelmed with the number of stories I wanted to keep up with.

It’s easy to fall behind on so many issues, especially if you follow the big two: Marvel and DC. Having the time and energy to get to your local comic bookstore (LCBS) every new comic book day…

View On WordPress

summary: So I bought an Iron Man toy yesterday and was really bummed about not being able to bring it to school (yes I am 17, what's your...
body: So I bought an Iron Man toy yesterday and was really bummed about not being able to bring it to school (yes I am 17, what’s your point?) so my brother started listing places I could hide him like pockets, folders, etc. Once I thought we’d exhausted all possibilities he goes “fine, then just shove him up your ass” and I, like any normal person, go “what the fuck” and this little shit says to me “well, you’ve always wanted Tony Stark in your ass so…” and I just - he - I mean, yes, but -

summary:
After a few rumours, we finally get confirmation via AMC theatres. 
To those with weak bladders; the best of luck to you folk....
body:
AVENGERS ENDGAME CONFIRMED TO BE 3hr 2min LONG!

After a few rumours, we finally get confirmation via AMC theatres.

To those with weak bladders; the best of luck to you folk.

To those with children that can’t be left alone at home; the best of luck to you also.

To those that aren’t emotionally ready for this movie; do I have to say it?

There’s gonna be SO much story packed into this bad boy. Three whole hours of superhero badassery. With that sort of runtime, you can definitely tell this’ll be the culmination of over a decade of amazing story telling. This is beyond epic!

body:
CHÉCATE LOS TRES NUEVOS Y ARÁCNIDOS PÓSTERS DE SPIDER-MAN: FAR FROM HOME #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #Marvel #Cine

Aunque todos los fans están a la espera por Avengers: Endgame, Marvel Studios quiere que recordemos que nos tiene preparada otra genial película para el verano. Por esa misma razón, hoy la productora compartió tres nuevos pósters de Spider-Man: Far From Home, la segunda cinta que protagonizará el juvenil actor Tom Holland como el arácnido héroe.

Los nuevos pósters fueron revelados por el…

summary: Spoilers alert for Captain Marvel but do you know how people joked about the cat being the one who will scratch Fury's eye? And...
body:
Spoilers alert for Captain Marvel but do you know how people joked about the cat being the one who will scratch Fury’s eye? And then it actually happened? Do y'all remember that?

Now are you guys familiar with Ant-Man is going to crawl inside Thanos’s asshole and expand in order to kill him in Endgame jokes?

title: Once Upon a Dream
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2UT0w44

by miserablesoldier

S.H.I.E.L.D found her broken, injured and feral after the destruction and hunting of her kind, they hid her away for years until one day when they deemed her ready and safe to the public, they gave her over to Director Nick Fury and in turn introduced her into the Avenger’s Initiative.

Words: 6645, Chapters: 3/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Tony Stark, Bruce Banner, Nick Fury

title: Puppy Face
body:
Making a puppy face can be a very efficient means of body language communication. The head is slightly tilted downward, the lower lip protrudes and the eyes look straight up at the other person. The purpose is to make one look slightly vulnerable and childlike with the intent of getting out of having to do what one does not really want to do or to plead forgiveness. The person making a puppy face might also simply want to gain sympathy by looking “cute”. It can also signal shyness and to a certain degree or be used as a plea not to expect too much. The puppy face is often pulled to provoke a smile in the other person and thus “to break the ice.”
Facial Expressions

tags: sorry i'm trying to spread it more
please please reblog and help if you can
summary: PLEASE HELP ME AND MY FAMILY Few months ago I started asking for donations because my sister’s husband left with another woman...
body:
PLEASE HELP ME AND MY FAMILY

Few months ago I started asking for donations because my sister’s husband left with another woman and has move to another country. We didn’t know where excacly. He doesn’t pay for anything, he doesn’t send any money. He is a piece of shit. He was homophobic towards me, he cheated on her when she was pregnant. He was controlling and jealous of everything. But my sister stayed with him because of the child.

Also she had to leave the place they live for the last 9 years because it was bought by his parents and they told her to move out. They never liked her and us because my family is poor.

She is back now in our parents home where I sill live too. There’s only two small rooms in the house, kitchen and one bathroom. All of this for 5 people now. They sleep on the floor in my bedrooom.

Also a two months ago my sister had a car accident and her car was completely trash. And she needs one because we live 5km from school and there’s no bus on my street or the next one.

For the last couple of months we raised 843$. It goes for bills, school payments and supplies and meds.

My sister is really depressed now and we need to help her with everything. She started taking antidepressands. They are not cheap and she still doesn’t work. So I ask you to help us a little more, maybe a month or two. You can find the rest information here.

Also we all are strugling so much. We only have my father’s pension. that’s 1300zl for five people for the entire month. My health is not letting me work right now. I have asthma attacks almost every day. and I may have SM like my mom. Right now i don’t have money to buy meds. I’m 2 months behind with my bills.This is all the money I have:

I don’t know what to do. All my meds:

Please if you can spare even a dollar, it would be amazing. Paypal: monicakil@mail.com OR gogetfunding
